Detailed Description

Text extracted during the recognition process.

This class stores the text that has been extracted from a press clip during the recognition process.

Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
2008-10-08

const unsigned int &  position 
)

Adds a character to the text at given position.

Parameters:
characterAsciiCode An integer with the ASCII code of character to add.
position An integer indicating the position where the character will be inserted.
Postcondition:
The character is inserted at given position.

void Text::addCharacter ( const std::wstring &  character,
const unsigned int &  position 
)

Adds a character to the text at given position.

Warning:
Though typed as string, only the first character of the string passed as parameter is taken.
Parameters:
character A STL wstring object with the character to add at its first position.
position An integer indicating the position where the character will be inserted.
Postcondition:
The first character in the string passed is inserted at given position.

Adds a character at the end of the text.

Postcondition:
The character is appended at the end of the text.
